snippet: In line with a recent policy of giving the public as much access as possible to historical material, the country’s national archivists have taken to relying on YouTube.
lead_paragraph: In line with a recent policy of giving the public as much access as possible to historical material, the country’s national archivists have taken to relying on YouTube.

headline.seo: From Politics to Ads, Israel Archives Meet YouTube
headline.main: From Politics to Ads, Israel Archives Meet YouTube
headline.print_headline: From Politics to Ads, Israel Archives Meet YouTube
